Index.title: Our services
Index.subTitle: We are ready to provide you with an individual approach and professional assistance in any situations related to employment and living in EU countries.

service_1.title: 5 EURO
service_1.text: Receive the first consultation from our experts who are ready to answer your questions and provide useful advice on employment in the European Union.

service_2.title: 50 EURO
service_2.text: We will assist you with all the formalities and procedures related to official employment in EU countries, providing you with the necessary documents and information.

service_3.title: NEGOTIABLE
service_3.text: If you have a problem with a partner or another conflict situation, we are ready to provide qualified assistance and support in its resolution, and we will agree on the price with you individually.

Partner.title: Affiliate Program
Partner.subTitle: WHO CAN BE A PARTNER OF OUR COMPANY:
Partner.cooperationList: Everything is simple! In the very first month of partnership with us, you can receive from 1000 euros in bonuses! You need to match your candidates with the vacancies we provide. Your income will increase with the number of of candidates, because bonuses start coming after the first working day of each employee.///Each month worked by one candidate will be equal to an award of 50 euros. Payment is made throughout the entire period of your employees' work. If you select 10 or more candidates who will work at the same time, your reward will increase to 60 euros.///We also pay nice bonuses if you recommend other employers to us. Just share the employer's contacts with our manager. After a successful transaction and the first month of cooperation, we will pay you a one-time reward of 300 euros.

Form.title: We provide necessary documents, including the A1 from the Polish company.
Form.subTitle: We prepare the necessary documents for official employment in European Union countries.
Form.list: Confirmation of client registration in a company in Poland./Signing the employment contract and the responsibility agreement./Processing documents at the consulate./Processing documents in the migration service and obtaining a work permit.
